articles.title: 3D X-DRAM technology will bring bigger, faster memory by 2026, but there's no way these 512GB modules will sell to consumers
articles.author: Efosa Udinmwen
articles.summary: NEO Semiconductor is introducing 3D X-DRAM memory, designed for AI and high-performance computing. This new memory features a vertically stacked architecture aiming for enhanced bandwidth, reduced power consumption, and a potential density of up to 512GB.

articles.title: Luft Pay TV debuts in Lagos
articles.author: Justice Okamgba
articles.summary: Luft Pay TV has launched its pay television service in Lagos, Nigeria. The service offers access to over 35 premium channels for N7,500 monthly. The decoder costs N25,000, while a full set-top box kit with accessories is priced at N35,000.

articles.title: The ultimate Dyson vacuum dupe: Aussies obsessed with this $114 cordless vacuum
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: Temu is offering a cordless vacuum for $114, featuring strong suction, a lightweight design, and a 45-minute runtime. The vacuum has a 6-layer filtration system and is receiving positive reviews, with a 4.8-star rating on Temu's website. The product is available with a two-year warranty and money-back guarantee.

articles.title: Cheating at Search with LLMs
articles.author: Nicholas Khami
articles.summary: The company is developing a new search technique using LLMs for the "Gen AI sales associate" Shopify app. The app enables customers to generate comparison tables for products, exemplified by LifeWater's "Sip" and "Life Straw" filterable straws. The new service will intelligently understand customer product comparison requests, overcoming limitations of traditional search methods.

articles.title: Toyota's new RAV4 makes world premiere in Japan
articles.author: Japan Today
articles.summary: Toyota Motor Corp unveiled its new RAV4 model, planning its launch in Japan before the end of FY2025. The sixth-generation RAV4 features a newly developed hybrid system to enhance acceleration and utilizes Arene, Toyota's software development platform, to improve safety, peace of mind, and the overall mobility experience.

articles.title: Aiper Reveals R&D Strategy, Signaling A Bold Future for the Robotic Pool Cleaning Industry  May. 21, 2025 21:30
articles.summary: Aiper unveiled its third-generation flagship model, Scuba X1 Pro Max, at CES 2025. This new model leads in cleaning performance, smart features, and underwater wireless communication, providing a more connected and user-friendly product experience.

articles.title: Score the Dyson V8 Extra pet hair-fighting vacuum for just $300
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Walmart is offering the Dyson V8 Extra cordless vacuum for $300, reduced from $470. The Dyson V8 Extra features Motorbar cleaner head with detangling technology and includes nine Dyson-engineered accessories. The vacuum offers up to 40 minutes of fade-free power and a whole-machine filtration system.

articles.title: Samsung, Gentle Monster join Google to give smart glasses another go
articles.author: KIM MIN-JEONG
articles.summary: Google unveiled its prototype smart glasses, powered by Gemini AI, at the 2025 Google I/O developer conference. These glasses, part of Google's Android XR platform, are being developed in collaboration with Samsung Electronics for hardware and Gentle Monster and Warby Parker for design, featuring real-time translation and integration of AI-generated content. These are different from existing products like Google Glass, Ray-ban Meta glasses and Apple's Vision Pro.

articles.title: Finding Ferdinand Shatters Sales Projections Following Debut Retail Launch at Credo Beauty
articles.author: Finding Ferdinand
articles.summary: Finding Ferdinand, a vegan beauty brand, launched its products online and in 14 Credo Beauty stores in March 2025. Within two months, the brand surpassed sales forecasts by triple digits, with their black lip balm being a top-selling product during a Credo Beauty sale. Credo Beauty praised Finding Ferdinand for its exceptional launch performance.

articles.title: Nearly 10 years later, Android is finally getting this useful feature
articles.author: Arthur Brown
articles.summary: Google, in partnership with Samsung, is developing a desktop mode for Android 16. This new mode will allow users to utilize the software on Android devices resembling a desktop computer. The interface will include windowed apps, taskbars, and app drawers, similar to Chrome OS.

articles.title: Carmen Electra Returns to Beauty With Electra Skincare
articles.author: Ryma Chikhoune
articles.summary: Carmen Electra, in collaboration with Mawer Capital, has launched a new vegan and cruelty-free skincare brand called Electra Skincare. The initial product line includes a Nourishing Cleansing Balm ($39), Hydrating Face Moisturizer ($39), and Oxygenating Serum ($69), with a bundle available for $99 and Mawer expects Electra Skincare to generate 'over a million dollars' in annual online revenue in its first year.

articles.title: Perry's Ice Cream reveals three new flavors. Here's how you can find them
articles.author: Samantha House
articles.summary: Perry's Ice Cream has launched three new ice cream flavors: Blueberry Cornbread, Lavender Dream, and The NutHouse (a collaboration with Ohio State University Athletics). These flavors aim to provide consumers with nostalgic and whimsical taste experiences.

articles.title: Knock $110 off the Dyson V8 Cordless Vacuum With This Spring Cleaning Deal
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 cordless stick vacuum offers versatility by functioning as both a floor and handheld vacuum. It features a lightweight design and various attachments, making it suitable for cleaning different surfaces and reaching difficult areas. The Dyson V8 is presented as a valuable option despite its price, due to its longevity and ability to replace multiple vacuum cleaners.

articles.title: Google Live Search Uses AI to Answer Questions About What Your Camera Sees
articles.author: Peta Pixel
articles.summary: Google introduced AI-powered search enhancements at I/O 2025, enabling real-time search using a smartphone camera's input.

articles.title: Why tap when Google's AI will scroll, search, and call for you?
articles.author: Justin Diaz
articles.summary: Google is enhancing Gemini with new argentic capabilities, enabling it to control phones for tasks like scrolling and calling. This upgrade aims to create a universal AI assistant. Additionally, Google plans to integrate Gemini-powered language translation into Google Meet and expand its use in cars and Google TV.

articles.title: REI Is Selling Exped's 'Fantastic' MegaMat Sleeping Pad for a Rare 25% Off, and Campers Say It's a 'Game Changer'
articles.author: Jeff Turbett
articles.summary: Exped's MegaMat Sleeping Pad is described as a large and durable product designed for extreme comfort. Men's Journal features the product, indicating its potential quality and desirability.

articles.title: Gaxos Labs Launches UnGPT.ai Setting a New Standard in Humanized AI  May. 21, 2025 20:00
articles.summary: Gaxos.ai Inc. has launched UnPGT.ai, a new tool designed to make AI-generated text sound more natural and human. UnGPT uses a proprietary multi-pass transformation model and includes features like an Adaptive Text Engine and Contextual Synonym Intelligence to improve the quality and authenticity of the text.

articles.title: Box Improves Enterprise Content Management With Advanced AI Functions
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Box is adapting its services to unlock new value from unstructured enterprise content using AI. This adaptation could set the stage for a new era of content management for the company.

articles.title: Shopify launches AI store builder to automate e-commerce site creation
articles.author: Monitoring Desk
articles.summary: Shopify has introduced a new generative AI feature to help merchants quickly set up online stores using simple descriptions. This integrated feature fully automates the store setup process, simplifying onboarding for new merchants. The launch is part of Shopify's broader push into AI to improve merchant efficiency.

articles.title: Everything We Learned at Google I/O. AI Mode in Chrome, Gemini Live, XR Glasses and ...
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Google introduced Flow, a powerful new generative video tool. Google's AI is integrated into various products including XR glasses.

articles.title: Huge appliance brand leaving China to avoid tariffs
articles.author: Cody Kline
articles.summary: SharkNinja launched the Ninja Luxe Café espresso maker, priced at $549, which quickly became the top-selling espresso SKU in the U.S. within six months of its release. This launch is part of SharkNinja's strategy to focus on premium-priced products to maintain profitability and reduce reliance on Chinese manufacturing.

articles.title: Farzad Vajihi Launches New Website to Showcase Expertise and Innovative Solutions
articles.author: Farzad Vajihi
articles.summary: Farzad Vajihi has launched a redesigned website, farzadvajihi.com, to offer tailored business solutions. The website features service descriptions, client success stories, and a blog with industry insights to help clients achieve sustainable growth. It also provides direct access to Farzad's consulting team for consultations.

articles.title: Guardz Joins the Pax8 Marketplace, Empowering MSPs to Secure Small Businesses with a Unified MDR
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Guardz, a cybersecurity company, has launched its AI-native unified detection and response platform on the Pax8 Marketplace. This allows MSPs to seamlessly deploy the platform to small businesses, offering managed detection and response services with real-time threat intelligence and automated response.

articles.title: 18 Beauty Game-Changers: Products Beyond 5-Star Rating
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: TirTir introduced a satin-finish cushion foundation for flawless wear. Yerba Mate launched a Wake Up eye gel to reduce puffiness. Eos released Vanilla Cashmere shea butter body lotion for soothing moisture. Touch in Sol launched No Poreblem primer for smooth makeup base. Elizabeth Mott introduced Thank Me Later eye primer enhancing eyeshadow pigment. Sol De Janeiro launched firming cream tightening and smoothing skin. Cosrx launched snail mucin repairing essence for hydrating skin. L'Oreal launched illuminating moisturizer for fabulous skin. Revlon released one-step hair dryer and volumizer. Wonderskin launched lip stain with real staying power. RobeCurls introduced heatless hair rod to create curls without heat. Venus Visage introduced teeth whitening pens for white teeth.

articles.title: OpenAI to Launch Physical Products Via $6.5 Billion Deal With Jony Ive
articles.author: Tianwei Zhang
articles.summary: OpenAI is partnering with Jony Ive's AI devices startup, io, in a deal valued at around $6.5 billion, to develop a new family of AI products. Ive and his design company LoveFrom will assume design responsibilities across OpenAI and io to bring 'delight, wonder and creative spirit' to the company's new offerings.

articles.title: Naga Fire Shield™: Fusion Enterprises unveils locally-branded fire safety solution
articles.summary: Fusion Enterprises launched Naga Fire Shield, a locally branded fire extinguisher in Kohima. The company aims to enhance fire safety standards and promote local brands with this product. The Naga Fire Shield intends to offer a quality product with after-sales service locally available to people of Nagaland.

articles.title: Google ramps up search with AI mode
articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.summary: Google is introducing a new AI mode for its search engine with advanced reasoning and multi-modality. The company is also launching real-time speech translation, virtual clothing try-ons, and 'agent' capabilities for Chrome and Gemini AI. Google is introducing an 'Ultra' subscription tier priced at $250 monthly for its advanced AI tools.

articles.title: Toyota debuts new software in latest RAV4
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Toyota unveiled its latest RAV4, a compact sport utility vehicle. The RAV4 will be Toyota's first model to feature its Arene software development platform.

articles.title: Huawei unveils mid-range Nova phones
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
articles.summary: HUAWEI Technologies has launched the Nova 14, its latest mid-range mobile phone series. The standard version's price starts at 2,699 yuan (US$375), and Pro and Ultra versions were also launched on Tuesday.

articles.title: Liquid Web Study: AI Side Hustles Are Booming -- Free Kit Helps Entrepreneurs Launch in 7 Days
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Liquid Web has launched a free "AI Side Hustle Starter Kit" to empower entrepreneurs in leveraging AI for rapid business launches. The kit includes tools, checklists, and templates designed to help users generate income within seven days. It aims to help entrepreneurs start, earn, and grow smarter by utilizing AI.

articles.title: Head, World's First AI Marketer, Sparks Frenzy; Spots Filled Instantly  May. 21, 2025 17:31
articles.summary: Head, a company based in Silicon Valley, has launched 'Head,' an AI Marketer service. Designed to manage the entire marketing lifecycle without direct human input, the service saw significant early interest, with over 50,000 users joining the waitlist upon announcement. Early partnerships have generated over $100 million in revenue for clients.

articles.title: Medical Malpractice – Alleged care delays led to neurological deficits
articles.author: Michigan Lawyers Weekly Staff
articles.summary: BTM introduces "Behind the Deal," a new program designed to showcase business deals. This new feature appears to be a service offering.

articles.title: The Dyson V8 Origin Cordless Vacuum Is Now On Sale
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Target is offering the Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum cleaner for $299.99, which is 30% off its original price of $429.99. The Dyson V8 Origin is a lightweight, cordless vacuum with strong suction, a washable filter, and a versatile design that transforms into a handheld vacuum. It includes various cleaning tools and a docking station.

articles.title: Revolution Beauty puts itself up for sale after bid approach
articles.author: Anna Wise
articles.summary: Revolution Beauty, a company selling make-up and cosmetics, has initiated a formal sale process. This decision indicates a potential shift in the company's direction that could influence future product or service strategies.

articles.title: Lambos Digital Acquires Dorado Ads to Enhance Amazon Advertising Capabilities
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Lambos Digital acquired Dorado Ads. Dorado Ads is a platform that simplifies Amazon Ads for agencies. The acquisition expands Lambos Digital's offerings in the digital advertising space.

articles.title: AWS Product Lifecycle & Service Availability Updates – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: AWS launched the AWS Product Lifecycle page, a centralized resource providing information on service availability changes. The page consolidates service availability details, including services closing access to new customers, services announcing end of support, and services that have reached their end-of-support date. This new service helps customers plan for service transitions.

articles.title: Greggs releases new summer menu - but everyone has the same big complaint
articles.author: Holly Kintuka
articles.summary: Greggs has introduced a new summer menu featuring 16 new items, including an iced caramelised latte, chicken, sweetcorn and red onion pizza, a red pepper, feta and spinach bake, a lemon meringue muffin, and fat-free Greek style yoghurt with strawberry compote. The summer menu was announced on Instagram and is available now.

articles.title: These On-Sale Dyson Hair Tools Won't Be in Stock at Nordstrom Next Week
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic Nural dryer, featuring intelligent heat sensors, scalp protect mode, and pause detection. The Dyson Airstrait is also available at a discounted price. Both the Supersonic Nural and Airstrait hair tools are available in a new deep purple and light pink colorway.

articles.title: TikTok Adds a Dedicated AI Assistant for In-App Sellers
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: TikTok has launched 'Seller Assistant,' an AI-powered chatbot within its Seller Center. This tool provides guidance, recommendations, and support to help sellers optimize product displays and marketing strategies within the TikTok Shop. Seller Assistant is now accessible in the TikTok Seller Center.

articles.title: Google launches ‘AI mode' on search engine to compete with chatbots
articles.author: France24
articles.summary: Google rolled out a new AI feature during its developers' conference. This new AI feature aims to transform a specific way.

articles.title: Nectar vs Purple: Which mattress should you choose? Our sleep expert weighs in.
articles.author: James Brains
articles.summary: Nectar and Purple are popular bed-in-a-box brands, with Nectar known for its budget-friendly Nectar Classic mattress and Purple for its patented GelFlex Grid featured in the Purple Mattress. The Nectar Classic features memory foam and a cool-to-the-touch cover, while the Purple Mattress has a gel grid for pressure relief and heat dissipation. Nectar Classic is available as a hybrid option.

articles.title: ‘It's one of the best I've ever tried' cries Dealz shopper over Marc Jacobs dupe – and it's a steal at €4.50
articles.author: Hannah Keegan
articles.summary: Dealz has launched a new perfume dupe called "Freshen up n Go" for €4.50, inspired by Marc Jacobs' Daisy perfume. This new product offers a budget-friendly alternative to the original fragrance, which retails for €84.50, potentially saving customers over €70.

articles.title: I/O 2025 Highlights: Google Android XR Glasses, Glow AI cinema creator, new Gemini AI tools and more
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Google is teasing Android XR Glasses. The glasses relate to the Android XR platform.

articles.title: LambdaTest Enhances Mobile App Testing with Camera Image Injection on Virtual Mobile Devices
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LambdaTest, a software quality platform, offers Browser & App Testing Cloud for cross-platform consistency. It also introduces HyperExecute, an AI-native test execution cloud, and KaneAI, a GenAI-native testing agent for automated test creation and execution.

articles.title: Amazon rolls out short-form AI-powered audio product summaries for select items
articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.summary: Amazon is testing a new AI-powered audio product summary feature on select product pages within the Amazon Shopping app. This feature, accessible via a 'Hear the highlights' button, uses AI-powered shopping experts to discuss product features, reviews, and information from the web to help customers save time and make shopping easier.

articles.title: New Google AI tools transform Creative Ads, Video Campaigns, Brand Listings
articles.author: Anu Adegbola
articles.summary: Google unveiled new AI-powered updates at Google Marketing Live 2025, including the Asset Studio for centralized creative tools and the Product Studio with proactive AI for merchants. Merchant Center is evolving into a brand and content HQ, and Google is testing immersive video ad formats, all designed to enhance content creation and shopping experiences.

articles.title: 8 hair dryers at Myntra fwd to get salon-like hair in minutes; Blow-dry like a pro!
articles.author: Shweta Pandey
articles.summary: Myntra fwd introduces a range of hair dryers from brands like Agaro, NOVA, VEGA, and Skmei. Agaro's Professional Hair Dryer boasts 2000 watts with ionic technology, while NOVA's NHP 8216 offers 1800W power with overheat protection. Skmei 2002 features a 1800W motor with quick-drying technology.

articles.title: ‘Wastin' away again in Margaritaville?' Put Hey Dude's new Margaritaville sneakers on your feet
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Hey Dude launched a new Margaritaville Sneakers collection, featuring six sneakers and a T-shirt priced between $30 and $80. The collection includes three men's Wally Sneaker styles and two women's Wendy Sneaker designs with tropical designs and vivid colors.

articles.title: My Jaw Dropped When Google Told Me How Its New AI Shopping Feature Handles Privacy
articles.author: Katelyn Chedraoui
articles.summary: Google introduced a new AI shopping feature at Google I/O 2025 that allows users to virtually try on clothing using a photo of their body. The virtual try-on feature is available in the US, ensuring user privacy by not using uploaded photos for training or sharing with third parties.

articles.title: FySelf introduces TwinH, a personalized digital twin that evolves with each user's identity
articles.author: Europa Press
articles.summary: FySelf has launched TwinH, a new AI-powered platform for creating personalized digital twins. TwinH learns from user behavior and preferences, acting as a representative in digital scenarios. The platform is designed for ethical data usage and compatibility with various communication and productivity tools.

articles.title: FySelf introduces TwinH, a personalized digital twin that evolves with each user's identity
articles.author: Europa Press
articles.summary: FySelf has launched TwinH, an AI-powered platform designed to create personalized digital twins. TwinH learns user preferences and behaviors to act as a trustworthy representative in digital scenarios. This platform aims to improve how identities are managed and reshape the concept of the digital self.

articles.title: Elon Musk's AI Home Assistant Moves Closer To Reality With Tesla Optimus Demo
articles.author: Buzz Staff
articles.summary: Tesla, under Elon Musk, has released a video showcasing its humanoid robot, Optimus, performing everyday chores such as vacuuming, cleaning, and stirring. Musk stated that Optimus will be the 'biggest product ever,' highlighting its potential as an AI-powered home assistant.

articles.title: How to clean windows the right way, according to cleaning experts
articles.author: Cory Fernandez
articles.summary: Windex launched a new glass and window cleaner that dispenses evenly as a foam, doesn't evaporate quickly, and has a twist-to-lock cap. The new cleaner was tested and preferred over the traditional Windex because it is easier to distribute and less prone to leaving streaks.

articles.title: Cheaper OnePlus Android phone gets Mac connection update before its big brother
articles.author: Sam Cross
articles.summary: OnePlus is introducing a new feature called O+ Connect that allows users to connect their phones with other devices, regardless of brand, including Apple products. The feature debuted on the OnePlus 13R and will be rolled out to the OnePlus 13, enabling file transfers and remote control between devices. Oppo's Find N5 already utilizes a similar feature.

articles.title: This New Round-the-World Sailing Vessel has a Massive Motoryacht-Style Salon
articles.author: Julia Zaltzman
articles.summary: Oyster Yachts announced the launch of its new 805 yacht, designed in collaboration with Humphreys Yacht Design. The 80-foot yacht features a twin-access swim platform, flexible interior arrangements, and options for keel length, solar power, and cabin configurations. The first Oyster 805 is expected to be delivered in 2027.

articles.title: How McDonald's transformed the Egg McMuffin sandwich forever with just one ingredient
articles.author: Brooke Steinberg
articles.summary: McDonald's Egg McMuffin, since its debut 50 years ago, had a change in its recipe: In 2015, McDonald's stopped using liquid margarine and switched to real dairy butter. This modification, taking about six months, improved the taste of the breakfast sandwich.

articles.title: 64 practical Father's Day gifts your dad will actually use
articles.author: Jillian Tracy
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products. Ninja Creami Deluxe allows users to create custom desserts at home. New Balance Men's 574 Core sneakers offer a modern upgrade to classic comfort. Coop Sleep Goods The Eden Cool+ Adjustable Pillow provides hot sleepers with a comfortable night's rest.

articles.title: "AI and bundled expertise make daily quality control more efficient and precise"
articles.summary: Dr. Lippert Inspection GmbH has launched the Lippert Toolbox app, a digital quality companion for fruit and vegetables. This app uses AI image analysis for objective product quality assessment and checks product labeling for legal compliance. The app is available on Android and iOS.

articles.title: PepperContent: Content creation tool
articles.author: Mazi
articles.summary: PepperContent, an AI-powered content creation tool, aims to revolutionize enterprise content marketing. PepperContent provides expert guidance in content strategy, including market research and crafting unique propositions. The platform streamlines the organic marketing process using its AI-powered stack.

articles.title: LG PARTNERS WITH CSC TO STRENGTHEN POSITION IN NORTH AMERICAN COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY MARKET
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics USA will supply its advanced commercial washers and dryers to CSC ServiceWorks under a new distribution agreement. This collaboration aims to strengthen LG's presence in the U.S. commercial laundry market and provide CSC with high-efficiency LG products designed for easy maintenance and operational efficiency.

articles.title: Amazon plans 60-minute drone deliveries for Samsung Galaxy phones
articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its Prime Air delivery service using the new MK30 drone, which can deliver items like Galaxy phones in under 60 minutes. The MK30 drone features advanced navigation and safety features, including obstacle detection and weather monitoring, and will operate in select areas of Texas and Arizona.

articles.title: Aldi fans rejoice over new Lacura Watermelon Serums which are dupe for cult K-beauty buy and a staggering 84% cheaper
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Aldi is launching two new Lacura Watermelon Serums, dupes for Glow Recipe, in stores on June 5, priced at £4.99 for 55ml. Additionally, Aldi is introducing a BHA Clearing Cleanser for £1.99 and bringing back the Lacura 2% BHA Toner for £4.49.

articles.title: How 'Intelligent Experiences' will change the way we engage online
articles.author: Fast Co Works
articles.summary: Huge design and tech company created an AI assistant called 'OLI' for NBCU to solve viewers finding what they wanted to watch, as well as where and when to watch it. Huge is also developing a personalized AI for a European luxury brand to replicate the experience of being in one of their boutiques. Huge is also bringing Huge Horizons, an immersive activation to turn innovation into reality to Fast Company's MIC [Most Innovative Companies] Summit.

articles.title: Beyond entry-level
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Xiaomi has unveiled the Redmi A5, a new phone with a stylish design. The Redmi A5 features a metallic feel camera surround, a slim body, a flat frame, and a smudge-free finish and comes in Midnight Black, Sandy Gold, Lake Green, and Ocean Blue colors.

articles.title: I tried the shiny new GHD gadget beauty insiders are raving about right now. Here's my honest review
articles.author: Sarah Fitzmaurice
articles.summary: ghd launched its first professional triple waver, the ghd Wave. This new product allows users to quickly and easily create bouncy waves, even on hair that is typically difficult to style. The ghd Wave features a three-barrel design and is designed to be user-friendly.

articles.title: VAST Data Unveils the Operating System for the Thinking Machine
articles.author: VAST Data
articles.summary: VAST Data has launched the VAST AI Operating System, a platform intended to drive future AI advancements. This new operating system is designed to simplify complexities and broaden the accessibility of new hardware.

articles.title: 42 Essential Baby Products For Your Home
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: The article discusses several new baby products, including the Baby Brezza Formula Pro Advanced and Bottle Washer Pro, designed to simplify bottle preparation and cleaning. It also features Frida Baby's Baby Basics Kit and Natural Vapor Bath Bombs, providing solutions for baby care and soothing during sickness. Further, the article mentions Tubby Todd's new micellar water for quick cleanups, Taking Cara Babies' frustration-free swaddle for better sleep and Newton Essential Crib Mattress made with unique material for babies to breathe through.

articles.title: TWS Launches AI Bud Tender to Revolutionize Cannabis Shopping Experience, Expands into Wholesale
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: TWS has launched its AI Bud Tender on its online platform, which is a virtual assistant designed to help users discover the right cannabis products. Additionally, TWS is expanding into wholesale, supplying high-quality cannabis and smoke shop products to retailers and other businesses.

articles.title: New Fiat Panda: Will It Happen? – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Fiat is generating buzz with the Fiat Panda 4x4 Concept, a potential future version of the iconic Panda. The concept blends retro styling with modern electric technology and all-terrain capabilities, featuring a design study with a retro-inspired look, rugged accessories, increased ground clearance, all-terrain tires, and a potential electrified rear axle for four-wheel drive.

articles.title: 'A total reimagining of search'
articles.summary: Google launched 'AI Mode,' a new service intended to disrupt its traditional search business. This launch accelerates the shift toward zero-click search, initially made clear by the March 2024 core update. The company's AI-only search aims to compete with the open web.

articles.title: 39 Amazon Products Reviewers Are So Completely Obsessed With, They Call ‘Em 'Must-Haves'
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: FryAway introduces Waste Cooking Oil Solidifier Powder, a product designed to simplify the disposal of leftover cooking grease. Additionally, Oxo has launched a 3-in-1 avocado tool designed to split, pit, and slice avocados.

articles.title: Google Announces Partnership with Gentle Monster as a First Partner for AI Smart Eyewear with Android XR
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Google announced a partnership with Gentle Monster at I/O 2025 to develop AI smart eyewear using Android XR. Gentle Monster will design the eyewear, focusing on aesthetics and comfort. This collaboration aims to integrate extended reality into everyday life through fashionable and technologically advanced eyewear.

articles.title: Google Announces Partnership with Gentle Monster as a First Partner for AI Smart Eyewear with Android XR
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Google announced a partnership with Gentle Monster at I/O 2025 to develop AI smart eyewear. Gentle Monster will be the first partner for this collaboration utilizing Android XR. The partnership aims to seamlessly integrate extended reality into everyday life through eyewear featuring cutting-edge smart technology and refined aesthetics.

articles.title: Core Gaming Introduces Nowifi: The Ultimate Offline Mobile Gaming Experience for On-the-Go Play
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Core Gaming, soon to be merged with Siyata Mobile Inc., is launching Nowifi, a new offline mini-game hub designed for mobile devices. Nowifi offers diverse game modes with multilingual support and focuses on privacy, allowing users to play without Wi-Fi or data usage through a freemium model that incorporates in-app purchases.

articles.title: OPTIMUS: Musk's 'Biggest Product of All Time' Will Do Your Dishes
articles.author: Stephen Green
articles.summary: Tesla is developing Optimus, a humanoid robot capable of performing household tasks using natural language instructions and learning from internet videos. Elon Musk anticipates Optimus will be a significant product, with an estimated cost between $20,000-$30,000, and a potential market release in 2026 or 2027.

articles.title: Loch Lomond Group acquires New York Distilling Company
articles.author: Peter A Walker
articles.summary: Loch Lomond Group acquired New York Distilling Company (NYDC) and its brands. Loch Lomond Group plans to invest in NYDC's facilities and products to boost growth in the US and globally through its distribution network, introducing NYDC's brands like Jaywalk Rye Whiskey and Dorothy Parker Gin to key markets.

articles.title: 33 Things To Make Your Life Seem Put-Together
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article highlights Olay facial cleaning wipes available on Amazon. It also features I Dew Care's dry shampoo powder with a powder-puff applicator for easy root application and John Frieda's Secret Weapon Touch Up Creme designed for use on fully dried hair. The iRobot Roomba is featured to vacuum and mop simultaneously.

articles.title: I challenged myself in the middle of Aldi
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced 'Guess the Flavour' drinks, a new mystery beverage line where customers can peel back the label to reveal the actual flavor after guessing. These drinks come in two versions, Flavour 1 and Flavour 2, each priced at 69p, challenging consumers to identify the mixed fruit flavors based on taste and smell.

articles.title: Finding out the flavour of Aldi's new 'mystery' drink blew my mind
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new 'Guess the Flavour' drinks, available as Flavour 1 and Flavour 2, priced at 69p each. These mystery drinks challenge customers to guess the flavors before revealing them by peeling back the label. Flavour 1 is a blend of blackberry, orange, and vanilla, while Flavour 2 combines peach, lime, and cream.

articles.title: Cool! Amazon Drones Can Now Interdevice From Apple And Samsung
articles.summary: Amazon is expanding its Prime Air drone delivery service to include Apple and Samsung products, offering delivery within 60 minutes. The service supports over 60,000 product types, including iPhones, AirPods, AirTags, Galaxy phones, tablets, and Ring doorbells. Customers can select drone delivery at checkout, ensuring a safe delivery process monitored by the drone's perception system.

articles.title: World First AI Marketer, Head, Triggers Huge Demand & Deep Job Security Concerns
articles.author: 美通社
articles.summary: Head, an innovative company, launched the world's first AI Marketer, an AI-piloted platform designed to intelligently handle marketing campaigns. This new AI Marketer offers features like automated market research, AI-driven content creation, and dynamic media buying, already generating significant revenue for early clients.

articles.title: World First AI Marketer, Head, Triggers Huge Demand & Deep Job Security Concerns
articles.summary: Head has launched the world's first AI Marketer, seeing high demand for early access. MAXSUN is also launching the MAXSUN Intel Arc Pro B60 Dual 48G Turbo graphics card, designed for AI inference and video processing, at COMPUTEX 2025.

articles.title: I can't guess the flavour of Aldi's new mystery 69p fizzy drinks
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi has launched two new fizzy drinks with a 'Guess the Aldi Flavour' theme. The drinks are labeled as flavour one and flavour two without flavour descriptions to let the customer guess the flavour. The flavour one is Blackberry, orange and vanilla and flavour two is Peach, lime and cream.

articles.title: motorola razr 60 ultra- the world's most powerful AI flip phone with a Snapdragon® 8 Elite processor goes on sale at Rs. 89,999* (16GB+512GB)
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Motorola has launched the razr 60 ultra, a new AI flip phone featuring a Snapdragon 8 Elite processor and moto AI features. The smartphone boasts a 3 X 50MP flip camera system, a large external display, and a durable hinge, and it is available for purchase at a price of Rs. 89,999 for the 16GB+512GB variant, with various offers available.

articles.title: Lidl shoppers say 'good old days are back' as 59p cake spotted on shelves
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced school cake slices in its stores for a limited time, priced at 59p. The launch has generated mixed reactions from shoppers, with some expressing excitement and nostalgia, while others have criticized the taste and size of the cake slices.

articles.title: MGA Entertainment Launches Wonder Factory- The Game-Changing Dough and Sand that Never Dry Out!
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment launched Wonder Factory Never Dry Dough and Sand Singles, featuring 4-in-1 packaging for enhanced play. The products are designed to inspire creativity and support childhood development through sensory play. They are also gluten-free and non-toxic.

articles.title: I tried the shiny new GHD gadget beauty insiders are raving about right now. Here's my honest review
articles.author: SARAH FITZMAURICE
articles.summary: ghd launched the ghd Wave, a new professional triple waver for creating waves quickly and easily. The tool heats up to 185 degrees and features an in-built stand and automatic sleep mode. It follows the Chronos Max launch with larger plates for faster styling.

articles.title: ‘I'm obsessed with it', cries Irish shopper as ‘refreshing' new drink hits stores for first time – but reviews are mixed
articles.author: Emma Kilcawley Hemani
articles.summary: 7up has launched a new Zero Sugar Pink Lemonade flavor, available in 330ml cans for €1.50 (excluding DRS charge). The drink is receiving mixed reviews from Irish shoppers, with some praising its refreshing taste and suitability as a mixer, while others find it lacking in flavor or comparing it unfavorably to similar products like Lucozade's pink lemonade.

articles.title: MGA Entertainment Launches Wonder Factory– The Game-Changing Dough and Sand that Never Dry Out!
articles.author: MGA Entertainment
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment has launched Wonder Factory, a new creative play line featuring dough and sand products. Designed to inspire creativity through sensory-driven experiences, the Wonder Factory product line is now available at Walmart.

articles.title: MGA Entertainment Launches Wonder Factory– The Game-Changing Dough and Sand that Never Dry Out!
articles.author: MGA Entertainment
articles.summary: MGA Entertainment launched Wonder Factory, a new brand of dough and sand products that never dry out. The product line includes various sets like the Never Dry Dough Extruder, Mega Box Set, Creation Station, Construction Trucks, and Starter Sets, all available at Walmart. The products aim to enhance creativity and fine motor skills in children.

articles.title: Luft Pay TV debuts in Lagos, redefines home entertainment with indigenous contents
articles.author: Blessing Olaifa
articles.summary: Luft Pay TV launched in Lagos, Nigeria, offering a new home entertainment service with indigenous content. The service provides over 35 premium channels for a monthly subscription of ₦7,500, with no hidden fees and the decoder costs ₦25,000 and STB kit with accessories costs ₦35,000. Luft Pay TV aims to champion local storytelling and project African stories globally.

articles.title: Stop Fighting Technology And Just Embrace It With These 48 Gadgets
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a variety of new products, including a motion-sensor trash can, a 3-in-1 wireless charger, and a Rubbermaid scrubber. Other new offerings include a Revlon One-Step dryer, a wireless pocket projector, and a fingerprint door handle. Additionally, the company now offers a SwitchBot Smart Switch Button Pusher, a wireless scanning pen, a heated jacket, wireless sleep headphones, a VHS to DVD converter, a mattress vacuum, a Samsung Frame TV, an Apple AirTag, a smart garage control system, a Eufy robot vacuum, a bagless touchless stationary vacuum, a robotic cat toy, a Zadro towel warmer, Bluetooth earbuds, an Echo Auto, a smart toothbrush, a smart notebook, a smartplug, a stain remover, a water flosser, an eye massager, a sunrise alarm clock, a safety outlet, and a wall charger.

articles.title: DRIVEN: New Honda Amaze arrives with better looks, high-value price tag
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Honda has launched the new Honda Amaze in South Africa, featuring design updates, new features like an 8.0-inch infotainment screen and a 7.0-inch TFT driver display, and an extended service plan. The Amaze retains its 1.2-litre engine and is available in both manual and CVT versions, with pricing starting just slightly above the previous model.

articles.title: Hair thickening shampoo labelled a 'game changer' for post-menopausal hair loss
articles.author: Grace Salmon
articles.summary: Philip Kingsley's Density Hair Thickening Shampoo is designed to enhance hair condition while giving it a fuller appearance. Noughty's Get Set Grow Shampoo volumises hair using organic pea sprouts, robusta coffee beans, piroctone olamine, and hyaluronic acid. Absolute Collagen's Thickening Collagen Complex Shampoo is clinically proven to increase hair thickness.

articles.title: Luft Pay TV enters Nigerias market
articles.author: Chuks Oyema-Aziken
articles.summary: Luft TV launched its Pay TV service in Nigeria. Luft TV promises Nigerians accessible, affordable, and locally relevant entertainment.

articles.title: Talk to me, Google - search just got personal
articles.author: Jay Waagmeester
articles.summary: Google has unveiled AI Mode, a new way to use Google Search powered by Gemini 2.5. This optional feature offers detailed answers, follow-up prompts, and curated links, providing a more conversational and reasoning-based search experience. CEO Sundar Pichai calls it a 'total reimagining of search.'

articles.title: Nékter Juice Bar Reinvents the Juice & Smoothie Experience Yet Again
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nékter Juice Bar is introducing a sweeping brand refresh across all US locations starting May 22, 2025. This refresh includes redesigned brand elements and focuses on enhanced customer experiences through innovations in functional wellness offerings, redesigned interiors, and a modernized ordering experience. The company aims to enhance accessibility and convenience for customers.

articles.title: Google looks to level up craftsmanship in new AI Search tools
articles.author: Rob Alderson
articles.summary: Google introduced several new AI-powered updates to its Search products, including AI mode, Deep Search, and Search Live, along with a data visualization tool. Other announcements included Google Flow, a new AI filmmaking tool, a new version of its image-generation tool Imagen and new Google Glasses. The AI tools are currently available in the US.

articles.title: Ozzy Tyres Sets New Industry Benchmark with 1 Millionth Customer Milestone
articles.summary: Ozzy Tyres is celebrating its one millionth customer milestone with a national promotion. This promotion includes discounts on mag wheels, exclusive tyre bundles, and giveaways like free fitments and upgrades. The company aims to reward customers and further solidify its market position as a leading tyre and wheel retailer.

articles.title: I tried Aldi's new mystery fizzy drinks and got the flavours all wrong
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Aldi has launched a new product called 'Guess the Flavour' drinks. The drink comes in two flavors, labeled Flavour 1 and Flavour 2, and challenges consumers to guess the flavor before revealing it by peeling off the label. Flavour 1 is blackberry, orange, and vanilla, while Flavour 2 is peach, lime, and cream.

articles.title: HONOR 400 Lite: Tap Once, Do More5 ways the AI Camera Button quietly changes everything
articles.author: Partnered Content
articles.summary: HONOR introduces the HONOR 400 Lite, a new phone featuring Android's first dedicated AI Camera Button. The phone is powered by the Dimensity 7025-Ultra processor and includes a bright AMOLED display, 24GB RAM Turbo, and a powerful battery.

articles.title: Head, World's First AI Marketer, Sparks Frenzy; Spots Filled Instantly
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Head, a company based in Silicon Valley, introduced Head, an AI Marketer designed to manage the entire marketing lifecycle without human input. This new class of AI has already driven over $100 million in revenue for clients. The company believes that it is introducing a new class of AI.

articles.title: Head, World's First AI Marketer, Sparks Frenzy; Spots Filled Instantly
articles.summary: Head launched "Head", a new AI Marketer, engineered to manage the entire marketing lifecycle. Within hours of announcing its early access phase, Head saw an unprecedented surge in interest. SANY plans to continuously boost investment in clean technology research and development, manufacturing facility upgrades and market expansion, to further expand clean energy product lines and efficient energy utilization solutions.

articles.title: Brits 'blown away' by 'phenomenal' earbuds with 32 hours' battery life
articles.author: Danielle Fowler
articles.summary: Skullcandy has launched the Method 360 ANC Earbuds, featuring noise-cancelling, a wireless design, and up to nine hours of battery life. These earbuds are available at Currys for £99.99 and come in bone and black colorways, offering water resistance and a quick charge function.

articles.title: AI unlocks secret meals
articles.author: Tania Rebello
articles.summary: Chat GPT by OpenAI introduces a feature to generate recipes based on user-provided ingredients. Users can customize recipes by specifying the number of servings, cuisines, courses, and ingredient quality, and the system stores user preferences for future recipe generation. This feature provides a flexible and personalized approach to meal planning.

articles.title: LG PARTNERS WITH CSC SERVICEWORKS TO BOOST NORTH AMERICAN COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY MARKET  May. 21, 2025 09:00
articles.summary: LG Electronics has partnered with CSC ServiceWorks to distribute LG's commercial washers and dryers in North America. This agreement aims to expand LG's presence in the B2B laundry market and ensure CSC has a stable supply of high-efficiency LG laundry products with advanced features like the Inverter Direct Drive motor and 3D Gyro Sensor.

articles.title: Best Whirlpool washing machines in 2025: Top picks with smart features, durability and user-friendly designs
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article showcases Whirlpool washing machines, emphasizing features like steam technology, in-built heaters, and smart sensors across various models. Specific models such as the Whirlpool 8 Kg 5 Star Inverter Front Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine and the Whirlpool 9 Kg 5 Star BloomWash Royal Plus Fully Automatic Top Load Washing Machine are featured, along with their unique capabilities like stain removal and efficient water usage.

articles.title: Inside Ally's customer referral program
articles.author: Caitlin Mullen
articles.summary: Ally Bank launched a customer referral program that rewards existing customers $50 and new customers $100 for opening accounts and taking specific actions. The program, which started with a small test in early 2024 and fully launched in August, has become a key part of Ally's marketing strategy, accounting for approximately 15% of its account volume and proving to be more efficient than other marketing channels. Ally is also working on ways to improve the program and encourage greater customer participation.

articles.title: 'Bought This Sponono Today': Woman Unboxes R1,7k Washing Machine
articles.author: Nerissa Naidoo
articles.summary: OK Furniture sells the Bennett Reid 8kg Single-Tub Compact Washing Machine. The washing machine is space-saving, water-efficient, and has custom wash programs. The compact appliance is priced at R1,700.

articles.title: From Roleplay to Real Connection: NSFW AI, Character AI 18, and Horny AI Explained
articles.author: Thandiubani
articles.summary: The article introduces new AI companions, such as those found on platforms like Crushon.AI, designed for adult interactions, including flirtatious conversations and personalized role-playing scenarios. These AI companions are powered by advanced technologies like Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning, enabling them to adapt to user preferences and provide engaging experiences.

articles.title: Morrisons and The Drinks Bureau team up to launch bag-in-box cocktail trio
articles.author: James Beeson
articles.summary: The Drinks Bureau is launching Party Box cocktails, including Lychee Martini, Strawberry Daiquiri, and Passion Fruit Martini flavors, in 280 Morrisons stores starting May 21st. Each 1.5-liter box contains 10 servings and will be sold for £15. The Drinks Bureau highlights the convenience, freshness, and reduced carbon footprint of the bag-in-box format.

articles.title: Smallest.ai Unveils Lightning V2 - World's Fastest, Most Human-Like AI Text-to-Speech in 16+ Languages
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Smallest.ai launched Lightning V2, a next-generation Text-to-Speech (TTS) model with exceptional voice realism, ultra-low latency, and deep customization supporting over 16 languages. This AI model offers real-time, emotionally rich voice experiences, and according to one customer, has led to a 50% reduction in call drops and a 70% increase in average call time.

articles.title: Tata Gluco+ gives a fresh twist to energy with their ‘Piyo Goodness, Karo Greatness' proposition crafted through AI
articles.summary: Tata Consumer Products Limited launched a new campaign, 'Piyo Goodness. Karo Greatness,' for Tata Gluco+. The campaign, targeting the youth, showcases a film produced using AI technology, highlighting the product's ability to provide energy for positive change. Tata Gluco+ is available in five flavors and promotes social responsibility.

articles.title: FourNet Unveils AI-powered Contact Centre ‘Agent' That Can Think, Act and Learn
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: FourNet has launched FourNet IntellAIgent, a new product designed to streamline operations, enhance customer experiences, and accelerate AI-driven transformation for businesses.  This solution is intended to help companies improve efficiency and better serve their customers through the use of artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Android Update Surprise – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung is launching an Android update for the Galaxy series. This update introduces a new service or feature to the Galaxy lineup.

articles.title: Khadlaj Perfumes Celebrates 28 Years of Legacy and Luxury, Taking UAE's Fragrance Heritage to the Global Stage
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Khadlaj Perfumes launched the KP25 series, a collection of five EDP sprays, to celebrate its silver jubilee. The brand also highlights its current bestsellers including Nuha Cherry Blush and Nuha Vanilla Pearl. The bold and unisex Azure Velvet extrait de parfum is also redefining power scents for a new generation.

articles.title: Some of My Favorite Smart Home Products Are Getting Smaller Models
articles.author: Amanda Blum
articles.summary: Mammotion has launched the Luba Mini robot lawn mower, a smaller and more affordable version of their existing Luba model. Designed for urban and suburban lawns under ¼ acre, the Luba Mini offers almost the same functionality as its larger counterpart, providing perimeter wire-free lawn care for smaller outdoor spaces. Mammotion's mowers use an RTK tower for accurate GPS-based navigation.

articles.title: You Can Get the Motorola Moto Edge+ Phone for $400 Right Now
articles.author: Pradershika Sharma
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto Edge+ (2023) is now available at its lowest price of $399.99, reduced from $649.99. This unlocked model features 8GB RAM and 512GB storage, with a 6.7-inch display and Gorilla Glass Victus back.

articles.title: Seven New Gemini Features Google Announced at I/O 2025
articles.author: Eric Ravenscraft
articles.summary: Google is introducing 'Agent Mode' to Gemini and Google Search, which allows the AI to perform tasks like finding apartments or event tickets and repeat them regularly. Gmail is updating its smart reply feature. These are AI-powered updates and features across Google's product line.

articles.title: FourNet Unveils AI-powered Contact Centre ‘Agent' That Can Think, Act and Learn
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: FourNet launched FourNet IntellAIgent on May 21, 2025. IntellAIgent aims to enable businesses to streamline operations and enhance customer experiences. This new product is designed to accelerate AI-driven transformation.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s launch date confirmed: Expected to unveil with Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, 6,260 mAh battery, 3 colour options, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus 13s in India on June 5th with a green color option. The phone will be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite CPU and feature a "Plus Key" instead of an alert slider, offering various functionalities. The OnePlus 13s might have a 6,260 mAh capacity and capability for 80W cable fast charging.

articles.title: Google Pixel 9a 256GB Black – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: The Tensor G4 powered smartphone is introduced with its Google Tensor G4 processor, a 6.3-inch P-OLED display, and advanced camera system. Running on Android 15, it features Wi-Fi 6e, 5G sub 6 GHz, and IP68 certification.

articles.title: This Is What Surprised Me Most About the Google I/O AI Shopping Feature
articles.author: Katelyn Chedraoui
articles.summary: Google introduced a new AI shopping feature that allows users to virtually "try on" clothing using a photo of their body. This feature, powered by a custom image-generation model, combines the user's image with the garment's image. The virtual try-on feature is currently available in the US, with plans for further updates.

articles.title: I Took Google's New Try On Feature for a Spin -- It Was Fascinating (and Hilarious)
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Google is launching a new AI-powered feature called 'Try On' within its Shopping tab. This service allows users to upload a photo of themselves and virtually 'try on' clothing items to see how they look, providing a more realistic online shopping experience.

articles.title: Wondrlab India, DermiCool unveil fully AI-generated ad film
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Emami's DermiCool has launched a new, fully AI-generated digital advertisement campaign called 'DermiCool Warriors'. Developed with Wondrlab and AI partners, the campaign film features a futuristic storyline and targets a younger, digitally native audience. This new campaign showcases DermiCool's effort to evolve brand communication with modern technology.

articles.title: Simba's May bank holiday sale is here! Save up to 20% on mattresses, beds and bedding
articles.author: Sarah Bradbury
articles.summary: Simba, a sleep-tech brand, has launched its May Bank Holiday Sale, offering up to 20% off on various sleep products. The sale, running from May 17 to 26, includes discounts on mattresses like the Hybrid® range and Earth Mattress range, as well as pillows and duvets, such as the Hybrid™ Pillow and Hybrid™ Duvet.

articles.title: Big loads, no hassle: Best 9kg automatic washing machines that actually make life easier
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung introduced 9kg top-load and front-load washing machines with features such as Eco Bubble technology, AI EcoBubble technology, and Wi-Fi control, while LG launched 9kg front-load and top-load washing machines with AI Direct Drive and steam technology. Godrej, Whirlpool, Voltas Beko, and Bosch also presented their 9kg front-load washing machines, emphasizing steam cleaning, Ozone Air Refresh, anti-bacterial wash, and anti-wrinkle features, respectively, all designed for efficient and hygienic laundry solutions.

articles.title: Google's AI Mode goes prime time, a direct answer to ChatGPT Search
articles.author: Mark Sullivan
articles.summary: Google launched AI Mode, a chatbot-style search interface powered by Gemini 2.5, making it generally available to all users. AI Mode allows users to interact with a large language model to refine search queries and receive conversational AI answers synthesized from various sources, enabling more complex and multipart questions.

articles.title: Dyson shoppers race to buy £89 vacuums before they sell out
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Dyson's Small and Light Ball vacuum cleaners, known for their rollerball design and powerful suction, are available as refurbished models for £89 at Wowcher, a 61% discount from the brand new price. Shoppers can choose between the Small Ball and Light Ball models, each with slight differences in weight and agility. Additionally, the Shark cordless stick vacuum cleaner is discounted by 32% at Amazon, and the SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner is available for £119.99.

articles.title: Gemini AI Ultra is Google's new ultimate 'VIP' plan for AI obsessives – here's what you get for its staggering price tag
articles.author: John-Anthony Disotto
articles.summary: Google has announced a new product or service. Further details about the product or service are not provided in the prompt.

articles.title: Samsung unveils thinnest model EVER with Galaxy S25 device measuring just 5.8mm thick - but there's...
articles.author: Wiliam Hunter
articles.summary: Samsung launched the new Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge at the Galaxy Unpacked event. The smartphone weighs 163 grams, has a 6.7-inch AMOLED display, and is available for pre-order ahead of its March 30 release in three colors. It's priced at £1099 ($1,099.99 US) for 256 GB and £1199 ($1,219.99 US) for 512 GB of storage.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 India Launch Timeline Announced: What To Expect From New Flagship
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Nothing has officially confirmed the launch timeline for its new flagship phone, the Nothing Phone 3. This phone will feature premium materials.

articles.title: New Forest Shortbread to release new ginger flavour
articles.author: Deb Gayen
articles.summary: New Forest Shortbread launched a new ginger shortbread flavor on May 20. The new flavor is crafted with Anchor butter, Tate & Lyle caster sugar, and Whitworths' Joyful Ginger and is available online and through selected retailers. The company describes the new variety as a delicious, bold ginger shortbread made in small batches.

articles.title: Google unveils AI chatbot, signaling a new era for search
articles.author: Tripp Mickle
articles.summary: Google is introducing AI Mode to its search engine, functioning as a chatbot for comprehensive answers and follow-up questions. This feature, announced on May 20, is part of a broader list of new AI capabilities, including personalized email replies and automated clothing purchase tools, aiming to reimagine Google's traditional search business.

articles.title: Best Xiaomi Robot Vacuum Cleaner: Flash Sale! – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Xiaomi has released the Vacuum X10+, a robot vacuum featuring S-Cross AI obstacle avoidance, ultrasonic carpet recognition, a 4000Pa suction fan, and a dual rotating pad mopping system. It can be controlled remotely via the Xiaomi Home App and is available on the Xiaomi website, Amazon, and AliExpress.

articles.title: Shaving Smooth: Top Affordable Foams Under ₹150
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Bombay Shaving Company offers a Charcoal & Sensitive Shaving Foam Combo, while The Man Company introduces Blanc Shaving Foam enriched with Glycerin and Vitamin E. Wild Stone presents Edge Shaving Foam with Cedarwood Oil, and MENZ launches Sensitive Skin Pre Shave Foam with Oat Milk and Moroccan Argan Oil, each catering to different skin types and shaving preferences.

articles.title: 62 Practical Products Anyone 25 Or Older Probably Needs
articles.author: Natalie Brown
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews several products including Olay Super Serum Body Wash, which has the same ingredients as their facial Super Serum. Other products mentioned are E.l.f.'s Poreless Putty Primer, which is an alternative to the Tatcha Silk Canvas Primer, and Keurig cleaner pods which you can pop into your Keurig coffee machine and \"brew\" to clean it.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a window-cleaning gadget that ‘performs like a dream' for £46 instead of £80
articles.author: Matt Breen
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Kärcher Window Vac WV 2 Plus from £79.99 to £45.99. The Kärcher Window Vac WV 2 Plus is designed for cleaning windows, mirrors, tiles, and shower screens, streak-free and drip-free. It includes two suction nozzles, a spray bottle, microfibre cloth, and Kärcher window cleaner concentrate.

articles.title: Microsoft unveils NLWeb project to turn every website into an AI-enabled app
articles.author: Business Today Desk
articles.summary: Microsoft has introduced NLWeb, a new open project designed to embed AI capabilities into the web. NLWeb enables websites to handle natural language queries, turning them into AI-powered chatbot interfaces. Each NLWeb-enabled site will act as a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server, making websites accessible and crawlable for AI agents.

articles.title: 8 most exciting AI features and tools revealed at Google I/O 2025
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Google unveiled new AI features at Google I/O, including an Inbox Cleanup feature in Gmail that allows users to delete emails based on conversational prompts.  Additionally, Google is introducing a new agentic checkout feature within AI Mode to track product prices and facilitate purchases at desired prices.

articles.title: I recommend this budget OnePlus phone over most low-cost devices - especially at $70 off
articles.author: Cesar Cadenas
articles.summary: OnePlus is offering a promotion on the OnePlus Nord N30 5G, reducing the price to $230 from its typical $300. Additionally, customers can choose a free gift with purchase, selecting between Half In-Ear Wired Digital Type-C Earphones or a Sandstone Bumper Case, along with the discounted OnePlus Nord N30 5G featuring 8GB of RAM, 128GB of storage, and a Chromatic Gray color.

articles.title: 39 Oh-So-Clever Products You'll Enjoy Showing Off A Little Too Much
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new products spanning multiple categories. Some products include 'floating' air conduction headphones, a hands-free rotating phone mount, vacuum-free compression bags, and self-heating foot masks, alongside other items like a flossing toothbrush, a laptop mouse jiggler, and a portable dual charger. These products aim to solve everyday problems, enhancing convenience and comfort in different scenarios like travel, personal care, and organization.

articles.title: Gotion Completes Pilot Line for All-Solid-State Battery Production
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Gotion unveiled six new energy products at the Global Technology Conference 2025, including the GEMSTONE all-solid-state battery, which has entered pre-production, and the G-Yuan quasi-solid-state battery with a 1,000 km range. Other products include G-Series batteries designed for 12-year use, the world's first 20MWh energy storage system, Astroinno Gen-2 Battery, and Axtrem Industrial AI Agent revolutionizing battery manufacturing.

articles.title: Daisy dairy plant construction to begin in Boone
articles.summary: Daisy Brand launched a multimillion-dollar project in Boone to build a one-million-square-foot facility for producing sour cream and cottage cheese. The new operation is expected to provide 255 jobs and source milk from 43,000 cows daily. Daisy Brand aims to have the plant operational by 2028.

articles.title: These are the best cleaning tools on Amazon to shop now
articles.author: Amber Bramble
articles.summary: The article highlights several new cleaning products available on Amazon. It features the MindSpoon Cordless Window Vacuum Cleaner, detailing its suction nozzle squeegee for streak-free cleaning. Other featured products include electric scrubbers, biodegradable cleaners, carpet and upholstery cleaners, merino wool cleaner, sonic scrubbers, cordless vacuums, and wool dryer balls.

articles.title: National Weather Service meteorologist shares his memories of Greenfield tornado
articles.summary: WeAreIowa provides the WeAreIowa app for streaming WeAreIowa content on phones.

articles.title: Google introduces AI feature to try clothes online
articles.author: Anmol Sharma
articles.summary: Google launched an AI feature called 'Try It On' at I/O 2025. The feature allows users to upload a picture and virtually try on clothes online. 'Try It On' has been rolled out in Search Labs in the US.

articles.title: Google Redefines Search With AI Mode But At What Cost For The Publishers?
articles.author: Manas Tiwari
articles.summary: Google has launched AI Mode, a new AI-powered search experience, within Google Search. This feature, powered by a custom version of Google's Gemini 2.5, provides end-to-end answer generation by breaking down complex questions and scouring the web with multiple simultaneous searches, potentially disrupting the traditional news and digital publishing industry.

articles.title: LG PARTNERS WITH CSC SERVICEWORKS TO BOOST NORTH AMERICAN COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY MARKET
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: LG Electronics has partnered with CSC ServiceWorks to supply commercial washers and dryers to North America. This agreement expands LG's presence in the North American commercial laundry market. LG commercial laundry solutions incorporate its advanced Inverter Direct Drive™ motor.

articles.title: LG PARTNERS WITH CSC SERVICEWORKS TO BOOST NORTH AMERICAN COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY MARKET
articles.author: LG Electronics
articles.summary: LG Electronics has signed a distribution agreement with CSC ServiceWorks to supply commercial washers and dryers. This agreement aims to strengthen LG's presence in the North American commercial laundry market.

articles.title: LG PARTNERS WITH CSC SERVICEWORKS TO BOOST NORTH AMERICAN COMMERCIAL LAUNDRY MARKET
articles.summary: LG Electronics has partnered with CSC ServiceWorks to supply commercial washers and dryers, enhancing LG's presence in the North American market. LG also unveiled the LG Professional lineup of large-capacity commercial washers and dryers at Texcare in Germany, further expanding its commercial laundry solutions portfolio.

articles.title: Sip On Something Fun At The New Soda Spot In MOA
articles.author: Paul Shea Paul Shea Published:
articles.summary: Macarons by Maddie Lu introduced a 'dirty soda' bar at its reopened location in the Mall of America last weekend. The shop will feature over 10 flavors of these creamy, cold beverages, along with their signature macarons and other baked goods. This is the first store in the Mall of America to offer dirty sodas.

articles.title: 40 Affordable Alternatives So Good, Only Your Wallet Will Know
articles.author: Negesti Kaudo
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen with SPF 35, offering a lightweight and non-greasy finish as a priming base for makeup, which is a Supergoop alternative. E.l.f. also introduced Camo Liquid Blush, celebrated for its long-lasting, highly-pigmented hues, comparable to Rare Beauty but more affordable. Nyx launched Fat Oil Lip Drip with vegan squalane, raspberry, and cloudberry oils, offering a juicy finish and hydration similar to Dior's version.

articles.title: LambdaTest Enhances Cross-Browser Testing with ChromeOS Support
articles.author: Canoe
articles.summary: LambdaTest has expanded its capabilities to offer real-time testing of web and Android apps on Chromebook devices. This new capability is designed to help developers ensure their applications work flawlessly on ChromeOS devices as adoption increases.

articles.title: Daisy Brand breaks ground on Boone plant expected to create over 100 jobs
articles.author: Natasha Keicher
articles.summary: Daisy Brand is constructing a new 750,000 square foot facility in Boone, Iowa. The $627 million facility will produce cottage cheese and sour cream and is expected to be operational by early 2029. The facility is projected to create approximately 106 jobs initially and around 255 jobs as demand grows.

articles.title: Velou: Decoding future of ecommerce
articles.summary: Velou introduces an AI-powered solution, including the '#ProductCatalogAgent', designed to refine product data for online retailers. This solution aims to improve product visibility, increase conversions, and enhance competitiveness by automatically identifying errors, filling in missing details, and ensuring up-to-date information across platforms. The goal is to enable online retailers to thrive in an AI-driven digital landscape by enhancing the intelligence and discoverability of their product information.

articles.title: Dongfeng Motor's 6,297 invention patents reflect rise of China's intelligent manufacturing (5)
articles.summary: Dongfeng Motor introduced its M Tech Intelligent Off-road Architecture, identified as China's first luxury electric off-road technology solution. The unveiling took place at the Dongfeng Motor Global Innovation Center in Wuhan Economic and Technological Development Zone.

articles.title: Dongfeng Motor's 6,297 invention patents reflect rise of China's intelligent manufacturing (3)
articles.summary: Dongfeng Motor displayed a new generation high energy density solid-state battery at its Global Innovation Center in Wuhan. This suggests the unveiling or introduction of a new battery technology by Dongfeng Motor.

articles.title: Beyond entry-level
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Xiaomi has unveiled the Redmi A5. The Redmi A5 boasts a stylish design and powerful performance. It features a metallic feel camera surround, a slim body, and a flat frame.

articles.title: CHAGEE's Signature Drink Gets a Meaningful Makeover: Introducing BO·YA JASMINE GREEN MILK TEA
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: CHAGEE is reintroducing its bestselling drink with a new name on International Tea Day, May 21st.

articles.title: Hahnair unveils Distriply One, the first NDC product from the new brand, Distriply by Hahnair
articles.author: Travel Daily News
articles.summary: Hahnair has launched Distriply One, the initial product under its new Distriply by Hahnair brand. This product, based on the NDC standard, aims to provide all travel sellers with accessible and efficient NDC solutions.

articles.title: Trolli Sour Brite Squad Unboxing
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Trolli has introduced new Sour Brite Squad gummies.

articles.title: AIOZ Network Launches AIOZ AI V1: A Collaborative AI Platform Powered by DePINs
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: AIOZ Network launched AIOZ AI V1. AIOZ AI V1 is a platform for sharing and monetizing AI.

articles.title: Treat Your Furry Friend With Up to $100 Off a Litter-Robot Bundle This Memorial Day
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Whisker is offering discounted bundles of its Litter-Robot product, providing a new, cleaner method for managing cat litter.

articles.title: Tata Altroz facelift to launch tomorrow: All you need to know
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Tata is launching the Altroz facelift tomorrow. This information highlights key details regarding the introduction of an updated product.

articles.title: SmoothSEO Launches RankReady: First Dual-Engine Content Creation Platform Built for SEO and AI Search Optimization
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SmoothSEO launched RankReady, a content creation tool. RankReady optimizes digital content for traditional SEO and AI-driven search. The product aims to innovate in the digital marketing space.

articles.title: Limited Time Offer: Domain and Hosting Order System with Hosting Template - only $15
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: domainCart is a PHP domain and web hosting order software that simplifies domain and hosting orders. The software features Ajax domain checking, WHOIS lookup, and shopping cart functionality. domainCart supports over 700 domain extensions and more than 25 online payment gateways.

articles.title: Smallest.ai Unveils Lightning V2 - World's Fastest, Most Human-Like AI Text-to-Speech in 16+ Languages
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Smallest.ai launched Lightning V2 on May 21, 2025. Lightning V2 is a next-generation Text-to-Speech (TTS) model that offers exceptional voice realism, ultra-low latency, and deep customization.

articles.title: Get ready for more ads in Google's AI search answers
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Google is expanding ads in AI Overviews from mobile to desktop. Google is also testing ads in AI Mode, introducing new opportunities for brand discovery through AI-powered ad tools.

articles.title: Starbucks brings back ‘best drink of all time' in US for a limited time this ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Starbucks released new limited-time beverages for the summer season.

articles.title: PNY's microSD Express cards for Nintendo Switch 2 are available to buy now in 128GB ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: PNY is introducing its new lineup of microSD Express cards. These cards are specifically designed for the Nintendo Switch 2.

articles.title: Ben Lomond launches special edition 2025 Open Championship gin
articles.author: Golf Business News
articles.summary: Ben Lomond Scottish Gin has launched its Open Special Edition. This launch signifies a new product introduction by the company.

articles.title: Jimmy launches in Saudi Arabia with Amit Trading Co. as exclusive distributor
articles.author: Saudi Gazette
articles.summary: JIMMY, a household appliance brand, officially launched in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. This launch followed a successful event with Amit Trading Co., JIMMY's exclusive distribution partner.

articles.title: ‘Wastin' away again in Margaritaville?' Put Hey Dude's new Margaritaville sneakers on your feet
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: Hey Dude launched a new sneaker collection.

articles.title: Nvidia Launches DGX Cloud Lepton to Solve GPU Shortages
articles.summary: Nvidia launched DGX Cloud Lepton, a decentralized system to ease GPU shortages by gathering unused GPU resources from multiple sources. DGX Cloud Lepton allows users to compare vendors based on availability, expense, and location, providing simpler access to computing power. Nvidia aims to empower smaller companies, labs, and startups previously limited by high-end GPU options.

articles.title: Amazon's AI Computers to Help You Shop? Shopping Experts Coming
articles.author: John McKay
articles.summary: Amazon is launching a new AI-generated 'shopping expert' tool. This service analyzes product details, consumer interests, and feedback to generate audio clips summarizing products for consumers. The feature is currently available to a select group of US consumers and is expected to expand.
